step.cmd: In main menu, select File Convert TBX File to TMX option or click the Convert TBX File to TMX button on the top toolbar.
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Convert TBX File to TMX Dialog

step.cmd: Type the name of the TBX file to be converted in the TBX File text box or use the associated Browse... button to select a file from the system.
Type the name of the TMX file to generate in the TMX File text box or use the associated Browse... button to select a file name and location.
Click the Convert TBX File to TMX button.

taskbody.result: Selected TBX file is converted to TMX and automatically opened in the editor if the Open Generated TMX File checkbox is selected.
